title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Japan 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
GDP growth rate compared to previous year is slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum GDP growth rate compared to previous year, about 1.94 was reported at Year 2017
The lowest GDP growth rate compared to previous year, of value 0.81 was reported at Year 2018
